sentence.Network_en: "Oh," he said carelessly. "I'm in no hurry to get back."
sentence.Network_cn: “噢，”他漫不经心地说道，“我不急着回去。”
他回答的时候漫不经心，没当回事。

sentence.Network_en: She was fined £100 for driving carelessly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她因开车违章，被罚款100英镑。

list.abs: Fires are often caused by cigarette ends which people carelessly throw away ., 火灾经常是由人们不小心扔掉的烟蒂引起的.
I carelessly tumbled and broke my upper lip ., 我不小心跌了一跤 , 把上唇摔破了.
asked the count carelessly , addressing himself half to Bertuccio , half to the notary ., 伯爵随意地问道 , 这句话一半是对贝尔图乔说的 , 一半是对公证人说的.
Tom scorched his jacket carelessly while he was smoking his pipe ., 汤姆抽烟斗时不小心把夹克烧焦.

entry.def: If someone does something carelessly, they do it without much thought or effort.

example.ex: He carelessly left the garage door unlocked...
example.tran: 他太粗心大意,竟然没锁车库的门。

example.ex: 'Oh,' he said carelessly. 'I'm in no hurry to get back.'
example.tran: “噢,”他漫不经心地说道,“我不急着回去。”

sentences.sentence: "carelessly raised the children's hopes without thinking of their possible disappointment"
"one unfortunately sees historic features carelessly lost when estates fall into unsympathetic hands"
"she wore her hat rakishly at an angle"

auth_sentence.content: What Wilde carelessly miscalled in print the Sonata Impassionata.
auth_sentence.res_content: What Wilde carelessly miscalled in print the Sonata Impassionata.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What Wilde carelessly miscalled in print the Sonata Impassionata.

auth_sentence.content: Sorry for carelessly using loaded terms in this discussion.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sorry for carelessly using loaded terms in this discussion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sorry for carelessly using loaded terms in this discussion.

auth_sentence.content: They would not just carelessly exaggerate would they?
auth_sentence.res_content: They would not just carelessly exaggerate would they?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They would not just carelessly exaggerate would they?

means.word_mean: 粗心大意地,不当心地;漫不经心地

sentences.en: carelessly throwing a lighted cigarette in the litter bin
sentences.cn: 随意把未灭的香烟扔进垃圾桶

sentences.en: All the pictures in the book were tipped in carelessly and are beginning to come loose.
sentences.cn: 这本书里所有的插图都加贴得不仔细,现在都开始脱页了。

sentences.en: Don’t bundle all the clothes into that bag so carelessly.
sentences.cn: 别把所有的衣服随随便便塞进那个手提包里。
